description: Gets definitions of the specified entities. Uses the latest version of the user's namespace by default. This API returns the following TDM entities. This action doesn't return definitions for systems, flows, and deployments.

parameters.name: ids
parameters.description: An array of entity IDs. The IDs should be in the following format. urn:tdm:REGION/ACCOUNT ID/default:device:DEVICENAME (string) ---

nested_items.name: descriptions
nested_items.description: An array of descriptions for the specified entities.

nested_items.name: createdAt
nested_items.description: The time at which the entity was created.

nested_items.name: definition
nested_items.description: The definition document of the entity.

nested_items.name: language
nested_items.description: The language used to define the entity. GRAPHQL is the only valid value.

nested_items.name: text
nested_items.description: The GraphQL text that defines the entity.
